name: PowPow Towers
description:
CONTROLS:

  • You control the red team.
  • Use scroll to zoom and WASD/Arrowkeys to move the camera.
  • Use the buttons on the screen or 1 through 4 to select building.
  • Click on one of your tiles to place them.

This game is made in Unity by Oskar Lundqvist , aka Abrovinsch.
